dataSet.name: DataSetMeasurements

calculatedField.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(MeasurementsCount)=1 THEN 0 ELSE SQRT(((SUM(EvalExpressionWithGroupArray("PopulationVariance*SUM(MeasurementsCount)"))/SUM(EvalExpressionWithGroupArray("SUM(MeasurementsCount)"))+ SUM(EvalExpressionWithGroupArray("(EvalExpression(""SUM(MeasurementsSum)/SUM(MeasurementsCount)"",,,""First"", ""Last"") - (SUM(MeasurementsSum)/SUM(MeasurementsCount))) * (EvalExpression(""SUM(MeasurementsSum)/SUM(MeasurementsCount)"",,,""First"", ""Last"") - (SUM(MeasurementsSum)/SUM(MeasurementsCount))) * MeasurementsCount"))/SUM(MeasurementsCount))*SUM(MeasurementsCount))/(SUM(MeasurementsCount) - 1)) END

totalField.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(MeasurementsCount)=1 THEN 0 ELSE SQRT(((SUM(EvalExpressionWithGroupArray("PopulationVariance*SUM(MeasurementsCount)"))/SUM(EvalExpressionWithGroupArray("SUM(MeasurementsCount)"))+ SUM(EvalExpressionWithGroupArray("(EvalExpression(""SUM(MeasurementsSum)/SUM(MeasurementsCount)"",,,""First"", ""Last"") - (SUM(MeasurementsSum)/SUM(MeasurementsCount))) * (EvalExpression(""SUM(MeasurementsSum)/SUM(MeasurementsCount)"",,,""First"", ""Last"") - (SUM(MeasurementsSum)/SUM(MeasurementsCount))) * MeasurementsCount"))/SUM(MeasurementsCount))*SUM(MeasurementsCount))/(SUM(MeasurementsCount) - 1)) END

parameter.dcsat:name: MeasurementPeriod
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN &MeasurementsFrequency=1 THEN FORMAT(MeasurementPeriod, "DF='dd.MM.yyyy''city. '' HH:mm'")+ "-" + FORMAT(DATEADD(MeasurementPeriod,"Minute",59), "DF='HH:mm'") WHEN &MeasurementsFrequency=2 THEN FORMAT(MeasurementPeriod, "DF='dd.MM.yyyy'") + "city." WHEN &MeasurementsFrequency=3 THEN CASE WHEN BEGINOFPERIOD(MeasurementPeriod, "WEEK") < &BeginOfPeriod THEN FORMAT(&BeginOfPeriod, "DF='dd.MM.yyyy''city.'''") + " - " + FORMAT(ENDOFPERIOD(MeasurementPeriod,"WEEK"), "DF='dd.MM.yyyy''city. '''") WHEN ENDOFPERIOD(MeasurementPeriod, "WEEK") > &EndOfPeriod THEN FORMAT(BEGINOFPERIOD(MeasurementPeriod, "WEEK"), "DF='dd.MM.yyyy''city.'''")+ " - " + FORMAT(&EndOfPeriod, "DF='dd.MM.yyyy''city. '''") ELSE FORMAT(BEGINOFPERIOD(MeasurementPeriod, "WEEK"), "DF='dd.MM.yyyy''city.'''")+ " - " + FORMAT(ENDOFPERIOD(MeasurementPeriod,"WEEK"), "DF='dd.MM.yyyy''city. '''") END WHEN &MeasurementsFrequency=4 THEN FORMAT(&BeginOfPeriod, "DF='dd.MM.yyyy'") + " - " + FORMAT(&EndOfPeriod, "DF='dd.MM.yyyy'") END

parameter.dcsat:name: APDEX
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN APDEXPrevious IS NULL THEN FORMAT(APDEX, "NFD=3; NZ=0,000") ELSE CASE WHEN APDEX - APDEXPrevious > 0 THEN FORMAT(APDEX, "NFD=3; NZ=0,000") + "(+" + FORMAT(APDEX - APDEXPrevious,"NFD=3; NZ=0,000") + ")" WHEN APDEX - APDEXPrevious < 0 THEN FORMAT(APDEX, "NFD=3; NZ=0,000") + "(-" + FORMAT(APDEXPrevious - APDEX,"NFD=3; NZ=0,000") + ")" ELSE FORMAT(APDEX, "NFD=3; NZ=0,000") END END

parameter.dcsat:name: AverageMeasurementValue
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN AverageMeasurementValue IS NULL THEN FORMAT(AverageMeasurementValue, "NFD=3; NZ=0,000") ELSE CASE WHEN AverageMeasurementValue - AverageMeasurementValuePrevious > 0 THEN FORMAT(AverageMeasurementValue, "NFD=3; NZ=0,000") + "(+" + FORMAT(AverageMeasurementValue - AverageMeasurementValuePrevious,"NFD=3; NZ=0,000") + ")" WHEN AverageMeasurementValue - AverageMeasurementValuePrevious < 0 THEN FORMAT(AverageMeasurementValue, "NFD=3; NZ=0,000") + "(-" + FORMAT(AverageMeasurementValuePrevious - AverageMeasurementValue, "NFD=3; NZ=0,000") + ")" ELSE FORMAT(AverageMeasurementValue, "NFD=3; NZ=0,000") END END
